'''Gifts of Encounter''' is a Web [[Event]] in [[Version 3.1]].

==Duration==
* September 28, 2022 – October 7, 2022 (UTC+8)

==Rules==
# During the event, go to HoYoLAB > Check-in and check in daily to obtain additional rewards based on your accumulated check-ins.
#* Please note: Making up for missed check-ins do not count towards the number of accumulated check-ins. Download the app and turn on notifications to avoid missing a day~
# The rewards obtained through your [[HoYoLAB Community Daily Check-In|daily check-in]] will be sent directly to the in-game mailbox of the character created under your HoYoverse Account. Remember to collect them in time.
# The additional check-in rewards will be distributed via in-game mail to the account of the character currently linked to your HoYoLAB account. The mail will expire after 30 days, so don't forget to claim the rewards in time.
#* During the event, daily check-in rewards and special check-in rewards can be obtained at the same time, without having to repeat the operation.

==Blessing of the Welkin Moon Prize Draw Details==
===Event Duration===
* Participation Period: September 28, 2022 00:00 – October 7, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8)
* Results: October 8, 2022, after 18:00 (UTC+8)
** There may be a delay in the distribution of rewards. All rewards should be distributed before October 8 24:00 (UTC+8)

===Participation Criteria===
* You must meet the following conditions to participate in the Prize Draw for the Blessing of the Welkin Moon:
# Reach Adventure Rank 10 or above
#*Reach Adventure Rank 10 or above before October 7, 2022 23:59 (UTC+8) to meet this requirement
# Check in once at the "Check-In Rewards" page
# Go to the [https://act.hoyolab.com/bbs/event/e20220906yka/index.html "Gifts of Encounter"] page to participate in the Prize Draw after successfully checking in

===Reward Details===
* After the event ends, we will randomly select 10% of the eligible participants to receive the {{Item|Blessing of the Welkin Moon|x=1}}. The remaining participants who are not selected will be rewarded with {{Item|Mora|x=100,000}}.

===Reward Issuance===
# Rewards will be issued via in-game mail after the results are announced on October 8, 2022 at 18:00 (UTC+8). Travelers may return to the event page to view their prize draw outcome, but it will not be necessary to collect rewards from the event page.
# Please note that there may be a delay in the distribution of rewards. All rewards should be distributed before October 8 24:00 (UTC+8).
# The in-game mail will expire after 30 days, so don't forget to claim your rewards in time.
